column4: hi, I'm using kubuntu with gnome apps, and I'm wondering how I can change the gnome icon theme to Human and make it persist in KDE? It seems to default to the "industrial" theme in KDE, and "Human" in GNOME. I want it to by Human in both environments
no, you misunderstand. I have the Human theme installed that's part of ubuntu-desktop, an I want GNOME apps to use that theme while my desktop is set to KDE...
